trans-unit.source: Provides functionality for an activity designer debugger view.
When implemented in a derived class, gets or sets the scope of execution within the source file.
The starting point location for execution within the source file.
When implemented in a derived class, gets or sets the current location of execution in a file being processed by the debugger.
The current location of execution in a file being processed by the debugger.
When implemented in a derived class, removes a breakpoint at the specified location in the source file.
A specific location in a target source code file.
Ensures that the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Debug.IDesignerDebugView"></xref> is visible.
A specific location in a target source code file.
When implemented in a derived class, returns a list of currently set breakpoint location-and-type pairs.
A list of currently set breakpoint location-and-type pairs.
When implemented in a derived class, returns an exact location in a source file based upon an approximate location.
A position within a source file that is known to be inexact.
An exact location within the source file.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the Xaml source file name should be hidden.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the Xaml source file name should be hidden; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
When implemented in a derived class, places a breakpoint at the specified location in a file.
A specific location in a target source code file.
The member of an enumeration of breakpoint types which may include Bounded, Conditional, Enabled, and None.
When implemented in a derived class, gets or sets a value that indicates whether debugging is enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if debugging is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
When implemented in a derived class, resets the position of the breakpoint in a file.
When implemented in a derived class, gets the selected <xref href="System.Activities.Debugger.SourceLocation"></xref>.
The selected source location.
When implemented in a derived class, updates the type of the breakpoint at a specified location in a file.
A specific location in a target source code file.
A specified type of breakpoint; for example, line, method, or exception breakpoints.
